title: What the fuck is up with this lag?
body: getting 40-60 ping, which is normal for me, but it feels like I have 1,000 ping. Game freezes and stutters and it's completely unplayable.

replies.body: I also get this, I play norm perfectly fine. So I go into ranked then with no ping 5 bar connection and 80 fps I still get stupid lag. It started around 5.6 patch, think its something wrong with the servers.

Has happened to me as well. 36 ping (which is standard for me) and FPS dropping every time I jump into a teamfight. Felt like I was lagging. Riot, can you please do something to fix this.

DW :D

fix this riot! its happening to 3 of my friends and also me...
Packet loss. Been happening to me for a few days. I usually close the client, reconnect to a game and it fixes it however you have to do it every game which is annoying.

I literally never lag, but the last 2-3 days have been unplayable.

I'm not blaming riot or trying to be a dick. but surely they can tell us whats going on.
